validation_rules: qc_prg5_wetland_validation(co_ter, cl_drain, gr_ess, cl_dens, cl_haut, type_eco, 1)
description: Translate only when one of wc, vt OR im is not NULL

Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID. Geocode_1_10 and geocode_11_20 are the original geocode string split into the first ten and second ten characters. Commas are replcaed with periods for use in the cas_id.

validation_rules: qc_prg5_wetland_validation(co_ter, cl_drain, gr_ess, cl_dens, cl_haut, type_eco, 1)
translation_rules: qc_prg5_wetland_translation(co_ter, cl_drain, gr_ess, cl_dens, cl_haut, type_eco, 1)
description: Check valid code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
